title: "Nissan aims to launch robotaxi service by 2027"
excerpt: "Nissan has been developing self-driving technology for more than a decade and has been running robotaxi trials in Japan and abroad since 2017, under the Easy Ride banner. For the service targeted to launch in 2027, Nissan will start a trial at Minato Mirai later this year and gradually scale it up ahead of the commercial service launching."
